aws:RequestTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a key that is present in the request the user makes to the EKS service

aws:ResourceTag/${TagKey}.description: Filters access by a tag key and value pair

aws:TagKeys.description: Filters access by the list of all the tag key names present in the request the user makes to the EKS service

eks:clientId.description: Filters access by the clientId present in the associateIdentityProviderConfig request the user makes to the EKS service

eks:issuerUrl.description: Filters access by the issuerUrl present in the associateIdentityProviderConfig request the user makes to the EKS service
